name: S.L.A.I.: Steel Lancer Arena International
synopsis: Konami brings the first online mech combat game to the PlayStation 2 with S.L.A.I.: Steel Lancer Arena International. The game puts you in the sport of the future, where players pilot their customized mechs to win cash. With a wide array of mech configurations and phantom stealth abilities, you can create a mech like no other. Tune up your machine with weapons, armor, and accessories. Once you're ready, you can enter multiple battlefields in single- and two-player contests, as well as four-player online mode.
